00021 #define CACHE_UNLOCKED 0        // Fully dynamic cache
00022 #define CACHE_LOCKED_PRELOAD 1  // Replacement policy is off, but
00023                                 // new blocks can be loaded in the cache
00024                                 // (in invalid cache lines only)
00025                                 // This mode is useful during preload phase
00026 #define CACHE_LOCKED 2          // Locked cache (block replacement and
00027                                 // loading of new blocks are both forbidden)
